column4: hi, i'm about to delete the recovery-partition from my notebook, what do i have to do after deleting the partition and maybe resizing the windows and ubuntu partitions?
i'm guessing i'll have to do something with grub in order to get it to boot again?
if all goes well you don't have to edit grub after resizing you partitions. But please back up all your data first
mzz: i'm going to delete a partition, so i guess the others will get renumbered ?
